subject: News article for Wolper web site
preview: News article for Wolper web site

full_threads.body:
Hi Michelle,


We've done a first design for the three pdf's you've requested.

The way we placed the forms layout is an interpretation from the attachments you sent previously, so if there's anything that should be displayed slightly differently, we will amend accordingly.

We've only applied a required field to the signature because we didn't know how many other fields would be required to be filled.
Regarding the Submit form button at the bottom of the form, it's already linked with the foundation email, but we can easily replaced for any email you need.


Please let us know if you're happy with the forms and if there's anything we need to tweak.


Thanks!

Perfect, leave it with us :)


We'll send it to you early next week.


Have a great weekend!

From: Joao from WP Perk <joao.henriques@wp-perk.intercom-mail.com>
Sent: Friday, 4 May 2018 2:35 PM
To: Michelle Stockley <MichelleStockley@wolper.com.au>
Subject: Re: News article for Wolper web site


Hi Michelle,


Sure we'll work on this interactive pdf's and send to you early next week.


Just have a couple of questions:


· Regarding the branding, do you have any guidelines that this A4 pdfs have to follow, or we just do them inline with the website?


Just in-line with the site would be great.


· When you say that the President of the Hospital doesn't like 'columns', is he referring to the boxed, outlined sections you've created?


He doesn’t like the way I have the questions on the left and answer fields on the right. He would prefer the answer fields under the questions.


Thanks

Hi Michelle,


Sure we'll work on this interactive pdf's and send to you early next week.


Just have a couple of questions:



  • Regarding the branding, do you have any guidelines that this A4 pdfs have to follow, or we just do them inline with the website?

  • When you say that the President of the Hospital doesn't like 'columns', is he referring to the boxed, outlined sections you've created?


Thanks

Hi Joao,


Well I have the green light for these 3 word doc to be whipped up into editable PDFs with the electronic signature functionality you showed me below.


All docs are attached. Please feel free to change the format as much as you need. In fact, the President of the Hospital has let me know that he would prefer not to use columns as I have done.


Please let me know if you need more info.


Thanks and have a great weekend,


Michelle.

Great!
Let us know if you need anything else.


Thanks!

Thanks Joao.


That’s perfect. I can clone that in future without causing too much damage.

Sure, you can check now, the post is now showing on the homepage as well.


Thanks!

Hi Joao,


I would like it in the news section on the front page as well.


Thank you.

Hi Michelle,


We've added the new post to the website, in the 'News Archive', would you like us to add it anywhere else, maybe the homepage?


Please let us know if there's anything we need to change or of you're happy with the post.


Thanks

Hi Michelle, 


Sure - no problems. This will be completed today and we will send you an email once it's live. 


Thanks and speak soon,

Hi Wolfie,

Could you please add this as a news article to the Wolper web site.

Once Jaqui is trained up I hope to stop hassling you with these simple requests.

Thanks,

Michelle.


Michelle Stockley

Marketing Manager

Wolper Jewish Hospital

E: michellestockley@wolper.com.au 8 Trelawney Street

T: 02 8324 2233 F: 02 9327 6910 Woollahra NSW 2025

M:0408 600 969 www.wolper.com.au

own virus checks before opening attachments.

This email and any attachments are confidential and may be privileged or contain
confidential information and is intended only for use of the addressee. Any
unauthorised direct or indirect dissemination, use, disclosure or copying is strictly
prohibited and may be unlawful. Please delete any emails received in error.

Any views, advice or opinions contained in this communication are those of the
individual sender except where the sender specifies and with authority states them
to be the views of Wolper Jewish Hospital.
